definitions.definition: To reflect light with a glittering luster ; to sparkle , coruscate , glint or flash .
labels: of a wet or greasy surface
definitions.label_groups: intransitive , of a wet or greasy surface

main_definition: ( intransitive , of a wet or greasy surface ) To reflect light with a glittering luster ; to sparkle , coruscate , glint or flash .
